text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Imi vanhu veGwaro (maJudha nemaKristu)! Musave munoraudzira mwero yechitendero chenyu (muchitenda mune zvimwe) kunze kwechokwadi, uye musave munotevedzera zvido zveavo vakarasika mushure, uye vakaita kuti vakawanda vave vanorasika, uye vakarasika (pachavo) kubva munzira yakanaka.”
